# CLError.Code.regionMonitoringFailure

**Case**

A constant that indicates the location manager failed to monitor a registered region.

## Declaration

```swift
case regionMonitoringFailure
```

## Discussion

Monitoring can fail if the app exceeds the maximum number of regions that it can monitor simultaneously. Monitoring can also fail if the region’s radius distance is too large.

## Getting region monitoring errors

- **CLError.Code.regionMonitoringDenied**: A constant that indicates the user denied access to the region monitoring service.
- **CLError.Code.regionMonitoringSetupDelayed**: A constant that indicates Core Location failed to initialize the region monitoring feature.
- **CLError.Code.regionMonitoringResponseDelayed**: A constant that indicates Core Location will deliver events but they may be delayed.
